ratapura bandhanagara kipayaka randawiyan sangawagena sitina mathdrawya saha jangama durakathana sewime meheyumak eeye (08) polisiya kriyathmaka kale ya.walikada chapal wattuwa pariksha kirimata giya polis niladharinta hu handa thabu randawiyan gal muguru walin pahara di athi bawa bandhanagara komasaris mejar janaral wi. aar. ke. silwa mahatha prakasha kaleya.adhikarana niyogayak paridi walikada bandhanagaraya, kantha anshaya, kolambaa rimand bandhanagaraya, magasin bandhanagaraya, migamuwa, kaluthara, mahara, anuradhapura, bogambara, thrikunamalaya bandhanagara ekawita sodisi kirim sidukala bawa ki komasariswaraya me wana wita udgatha wu thaththwaya palanaya kala bawath siddhiya wu chapal bandhanagaraya nawatha sodisi kirimak sidukala bawath kiya.mema kadakappalkari kriyawa sidukala aakaraya pilibandawa soya balimata thama adala niladharinta niyoga kala bawa ki silwa mahatha rajaya gena yana mathdrawya niwarana wadasatahanata samagamiwa bandhanagara thula mathdrawya thuran kirima sandaha gathayuthu sama piyawarak ma ganna bawa da kiya.me athara, bandhanagarawala sidukala mema sodisi meheyuma thula di walikadadi yam siddhiyak wartha wu bawath ema thaththwaya samathayakata path karalimata polis niladharinta haki wi thibena bawath punaruththapana ha bandhanagara prathisanskarana amathya diyu gunasekara mahatha ‘dinamina’ta pawasiya.pasugiya kalaye di mathdrawya samanga athadanguwata gath siddhin 1000k pamana wartha wu bawath mewata sambandha aya danata bandhanagara gathawa sitina bawath pawasu amathyawaraya me aya mathdrawya jawaramkaruwan samanga ganudenu kirima walakwima mema sodisi meheyume aramunu wu bawath kiya.
